attributes.action: Make it freely available for the general public to view an itemised statement of all expensives claimed from the public purse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please make it known to the general public, who are in fact the employers of the Government, To reveal exactly how much each MP claims back from the public purse and people they serve in this country by way of itemised allowancies they claim to be made freely available to the general public

rejection.details: This a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
